short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Trustworthy browser extension to instantly save Gmail attachments, local files and screenshots directly to your account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start streamlining your document management process, increasing your family‚Äôs productivity, and protecting your important attachments. 

The Trustworthy browser extension can run in your browser allowing you to grab Gmail attachments, local files and screenshots and send them directly to your Trustworthy account. 

üîí Security First:
